frameDefinitions: An Experiencer has an easy or difficult time carrying out an Activity.
The Temperature in a certain environment, determined by Time and Place, is specified.
An Event causes the Cognizer to accept some Content.
An Entity has a Temperature characterized by the target.
A Payer gives up (or potentially gives up) the use of an Asset (generally money) in order to achieve an Intended_event.

A Behavior, attributed to an Evaluee, conforms with or is heavily influenced by a popular trend or practice, often in the realm of fashion, design, though extending social and interactional behavior in general.
frameExamples: It's too <t>hot</t> to do anything today.
The divorce <t>convinced</t> him to get help.
The pan is already too <t>hot</t> to touch.
It 'll <t>cost</t> Sandra's parents fifty grand a year for her to attend that school.
Wearing flowered brocaded silks was <t>fashionable</t> in the first few years of the decade.
listRoleDefinitions: This Frame Element marks expressions indicating the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> finds difficult or easy. In many cases, the relevant <fen>Activity</fen> has to be inferred from the context.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate which person judges carrying out the <fen>Activity</fen> to be easy or difficult.
The time at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> where  it is a certain <fen>Temperature</fen> .
The temperature feature of the weather.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Temperature</fen> of the environment.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which an ambient environment has a particular <fen>Temperature</fen>.
The meteorological conditions which determine the ambient temperature of a locale.
The person who perceives the <fen>Event</fen> and changes his or her mind.
The new idea that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> accepts as a result of experiencing the <fen>Event</fen>.
The Event which motivates the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to change his/her mind.
The time at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is affected by an outside <fen>Event</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> accepts the <fen>Content</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Degree</fen> for the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The role <fen>Goods</fen> is the item(s) whose price is being assessed.  <fen>Goods</fen> is usually an External Argument:
The person whose <fen>Asset</fen> is given up in order to achieve an <fen>Intended_event</fen>.  This role is often expressed as INI.
The price of or payment made for the Goods.
The event that the <fen>Payer</fen> brings about by deploying the <fen>Asset</fen>.
The time when a transaction takes place.
The <fen>Behavior</fen> which is trendy.
The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged to conform to some degree with popular fashion with respect to his or her behavior.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Behavior</fen> is trendy or fashionable.
The location where the <fen>Behavior</fen> is trendy..
listRoleExamples: The geology question on the exam was hard <fex>for me</fex>.
The temperature  was <fex>85 F</fex> in the shade today
It's like <fex>totally</fex> chilly, dude, like, totally.
We get warmer <fex>weather</fex> this time of year.
<fex>The accident</fex> convinced him to drive slower.
The skillet had a temperature <fex>of 230 F</fex>
A holiday in Europe is very expensive <fex>for me</fex>.
No, they've got a special on; it's really cheap there <fex>on Tuesdays</fex>
